Bend.Goodwillie\u2013Allen House: The Goodwillie-Allen House (also known as the Goodwillie House, H. E. Allen House, Allen-Rademacher House, and Goodwillie-Allen-Rademacher House) is a small American Craftsman-style bungalow located in Bend, Oregon. The house was constructed in 1904 by Arthur Goodwillie, the first mayor of Bend. Today, the building is owned by the City of Bend.
